text:
my tomcat is running on default port 8080. but at times it gets stuck. It does
not respond. when i try to shutdown tomcat i get error and if i try to start it
then it gives me the error : java.net.BindException, port 8080 already in use. i
am also using AJP connector for directing requests from apache web server
creator: keyur@cyberwebglobal.com

text:
This looks like a configuration problem to me. Please follow up on the tomcat-
user mailing list.
creator: markt@apache.org
